video.title: Rules of Engagement
video.synopsis: Three diverse perspectives on relationships are examined in this ensemble sitcom, featuring a married couple, an engaged pair, and a cynical bachelor.

episodes.synopsis: Jeff and Audrey learn their next door neighbor, Jennifer, has become engaged to her boyfriend, Adam. Some advice ends up giving Adam second thoughts.
episodes.title: Pilot

episodes.synopsis: Audrey spends too much time planning Jeff's birthday party. Russell is determined to find out what Jeff's birthday present is going to be.
episodes.title: The Birthday Deal

episodes.synopsis: Audrey bets Jeff that he can't get a phone number from a younger girl, and gives him a night without his wedding ring to try it.
episodes.title: The Young and the Restless

episodes.synopsis: Audrey gets upset when Jeff pays more attention to a game on TV than the news of her big promotion.
episodes.title: Game On

episodes.synopsis: Russell accidentally runs into an older woman from his past named Constance. He then tries to impress her with his physical gifts.
episodes.title: Kids

episodes.synopsis: Jeff isn't sure how to explain to Audrey his "excitement" while Jennifer was giving him a massage.
episodes.title: Hard Day's Night

episodes.synopsis: Audrey is scared by Jeff's attachment to his t-shirts. She wonders if his best times in life may have been before he met her.
episodes.title: Jeff's Wooby

episodes.synopsis: Adam enjoys stealing the attention of Russell's female admirers, prompting fiancée Jennifer to lay down the law and Russell to seek revenge.
episodes.title: Flirting with Disaster

episodes.synopsis: A surprise visit from Audrey's sister Barbara opens a window of opportunity for Russell to prove that beauty is more than what meets the eye.
episodes.title: Audrey's Sister

episodes.synopsis: Jeff and Audrey tackle communication issues while Adam and Jennifer discover whether creating a home-made "videotape" will spice up their love life.
episodes.title: Mr. Fix It

episodes.synopsis: Audrey persuades Jeff to double-date, which inadvertently puts the rules governed by the "guy code" versus the "marriage code" to the test.
episodes.title: Guy Code

episodes.synopsis: Russell realizes the cost of dating a "bag lady," while Adam experiences the social peril of yielding to Jennifer's wishes and sporting a "man bag.
episodes.title: Bag Ladies

episodes.synopsis: Jeff is given an opportunity to "live it up" during a night out on the town, landing Russell in hot water.
episodes.title: Old School Jeff

episodes.synopsis: In an effort to capitalize on his commitment to Jennifer, Adam convinces Jeff to host an engagement party.
episodes.title: Engagement Party

episodes.synopsis: Jennifer and Audrey practice their match-making skills and inadvertently end up date-less while Adam and Jeff score financial gain in the process.
episodes.title: Fix Ups & Downs

episodes.synopsis: A visit from Adam's free-spirited mother puts Jennifer's patience to the test and teaches Russell an embarrassing lesson about "art.
episodes.title: A Visit From Fay

episodes.synopsis: Jeff and Audrey invite Adam and Jennifer to join them on a romantic getaway.
episodes.title: Time Share

episodes.synopsis: Despite a warning from Russell, Adam hires Jennifer to design a new brochure for a client.
episodes.title: Jen at Work

episodes.synopsis: Jeff's drive to be labeled an "optimal male" on his life-insurance physical leads him to some extreme behavior.
episodes.title: Optimal Male

episodes.synopsis: Russell puts on a show to impress his father when he comes to town, but both he and Adam learn the meaning of a parent's tough love.
episodes.title: Russel's Father's Son

episodes.synopsis: Jennifer and Adam attempt to practice fiscal responsibility as they consider buying their apartment.
episodes.title: Buyer's Remorse

episodes.synopsis: Russell reluctantly agrees to host a photo shoot in his apartment for Audrey's magazine, with the hope of landing a date with a hot model.
episodes.title: Pimp My Bride

episodes.synopsis: When Jeff gives Audrey tickets to a musical, she could not be more enthused.
episodes.title: Russell's Secret

episodes.synopsis: While Russell's new male assistant, Timmy, makes Russell's job and love life a breeze, Adam becomes disgusted with Russell's new reign of boss terror.
episodes.title: Voluntary Commitment

episodes.synopsis: As Jeff expands his social network by becoming friends with a person from his gym, he's quickly convinced by Audrey and Adam that the guy is gay!
episodes.title: Jeff's New Friend

episodes.synopsis: Things get a bit burdensome for Jeff and Audry when a simple visit from Jeff's father turns into a nightmare after he sprains his ankle.
episodes.title: Dad's Visit

episodes.synopsis: Things get complicated when Audrey and Jeff decide to ditch a dinner date with Jennifer and Adam in order to attend a friend's celebrity packed party.
episodes.title: Lyin' King

episodes.synopsis: When Audrey's problems with her assistant Tanya becomes too much for her to stand, Russell's new assistant Timmy looks like the perfect replacement.
episodes.title: Poaching Timmy

episodes.synopsis: When Jeff throws out his back after sneezing during his league baseball game, everyone starts to make fun of him being old and bent out of shape.
episodes.title: Old Timer's Day

episodes.synopsis: When Audrey becomes jealous of a pregnant co-worker, she inadvertently convinces her colleagues that she has a bundle of joy on the way too.
episodes.title: Twice

episodes.synopsis: When Jeff, Russell and Adam make a bet to see who would be able to score the soonest, the three rise up to the challenge.
episodes.title: The Challenge

episodes.synopsis: When Audrey plans a dinner date with Jeff, Jackie and Brad, Jeff feels extremely violated when Jackie begins eating off his plate!
episodes.title: Family Style

episodes.synopsis: When Audrey invites her and Jeff's recently divorced friend to stay with them for a few days, Audrey thinks she may have become his newest rebound.
episodes.title: May Divorce Be with You

episodes.synopsis: When Jennifer and Russell decide to teach Adam a lesson in responsibility, the joke is on them when Adam has the last laugh.
episodes.title: House Money

episodes.synopsis: When Jennifer and Audrey throw a "girls only" sex party, Jeff quickly gets insecure when he finds a "product" Audrey may have purchased.
episodes.title: Sex Toy Story

episodes.synopsis: After Jeff fails to pick up a number of texts from Audrey, she tells him he needs to embrace this new technology.
episodes.title: Flirting

episodes.synopsis: When Jeff and Audrey switch sides of the bed, Jeff accidentally tosses over and hits Audrey in the face, landing her in the hospital.
episodes.title: Snoozin' for a Bruisin'

episodes.synopsis: Jeff is pleased to be going to Atlantic City with friends and avoiding Audrey's Aunt's visit. When his friend calls off the trip, Jeff goes anyway.
episodes.title: Atlantic City

episodes.synopsis: Audrey's upset when Jeff reveals to her that he doesn't believe she saw her dead grandmother's ghost.
episodes.title: Ghost Story

episodes.synopsis: Audrey convinces Jeff to go to couple's therapy, while Adam tries to take a non gay picture for his engagement photo with Jen.
episodes.title: The Four Pillars

episodes.synopsis: Audrey lies to her ugly friend Liz that Jeff is attracted to her. She then misses a dinner she plans with Jeff and Liz, leaving them alone together.
episodes.title: 3rd Wheel

episodes.synopsis: Competitive tension flares when it's revealed that Jeff used to date the star of Jennifer's favorite dancing competition show.
episodes.title: Indian Giver

episodes.synopsis: Russell brings Timmy to a video game launch party hosted by his former assistant, to prove how powerful his "tough love" approach to things is.
episodes.title: Free Free Time

episodes.synopsis: Jeff goes with Audrey to a work event but spends most of the night concerned about not hearing the score of the Ranger game.
episodes.title: The Score

episodes.synopsis: An overly enthusiastic Audrey pushes it too far with a surrogate mother who she and Jeff are considering paying to have their baby.
episodes.title: The Surrogate

episodes.synopsis: Audrey attends her high school reunion intent on proving to her former classmates how great her life is in New York City.
episodes.title: The Reunion

episodes.synopsis: A new employee with an axe to grind against Audrey files a sexual harassment claim against her.
episodes.title: Harassment

episodes.synopsis: Adam and Jennifer plan a secret wedding; however, a series of unfortunate events puts their plan in jeopardy.
episodes.title: They Do?

episodes.synopsis: We pick up where we left off in the season four finale, Russell going down in the elevator with Pam, Audrey and Jeff's surrogate.
episodes.title: Surro-Gate

episodes.synopsis: After Jeff forgets to mail in a check for Audrey, and she gets mad, he reminds her about a video she forget to return for him a few weeks prior.
episodes.title: The Bank

episodes.synopsis: Jeff and Audrey decide to get a new rug with the help of Timmy whose cousin owns a rug store.
episodes.title: Rug-of-War

episodes.synopsis: After many years the romance has gone out Audrey and Jeff's marriage, as indicated by Jeff's frequent "self-serving".
episodes.title: Handy Man

episodes.synopsis: Timmy is frustrated because his new girlfriend Allison wants to abstain from sex so they can get to know each other.
episodes.title: Play Ball

episodes.synopsis: Audrey decides to clean out their storage unit in the basement and comes to the conclusion that she wants to make cookies for a living.
episodes.title: Baked

episodes.synopsis: Jeff's been stressed about cash since Audrey quit her job, and despite leasing space for her to start her cookie business, she's no longer interested.
episodes.title: Mannequin Head Ball

episodes.synopsis: Russell's mother Bunny Dunbar comes to town to visit, and he's excited by all the extravagant gifts she gives him but Timmy is not impressed.
episodes.title: Les-Bro

episodes.synopsis: Jeff needs to secure his year end bonus and does not want to kiss up to his boss Larry, so Audrey volunteers to flirt with him to help matters.
episodes.title: The Big Picture

episodes.synopsis: Feeling the financial pinch of Audrey not working, Jeff loses his cool after being bombarded by co-workers requesting various charitable donations.
episodes.title: Fun Run

episodes.synopsis: After taking a job as a hostess at an upscale brunch spot, Audrey runs into an old friend and is too embarrassed to tell her about her position.
episodes.title: Refusing to Budget

episodes.synopsis: Jeff and Audrey attend his company Christmas party where their debate of which one of them is the more humorous and charming is put to the test.
episodes.title: Little Bummer Boy

episodes.synopsis: Audrey starts private pilates sessions at home and Jeff is thrilled when the workouts increase Audrey's sex drive.
episodes.title: The Home Stretch

episodes.synopsis: Russell takes his date Jessica to a Criss Angel magic show to impress her, only to have Criss make her disappear as part of the show, and not return.
episodes.title: Uh-oh It's Magic

episodes.synopsis: Audrey considers going back to work and interviews to be the office manager for an internet start up company.
episodes.title: Singing and Dancing

episodes.synopsis: When Jeff proclaims it's 'Jeff Day', he gets his way until the cleaning lady arrives. Meanwhile, Adam has to figure out why his eye is twitching.
episodes.title: Jeff's Day

episodes.synopsis: When Jeff and Audrey see a fertility specialist with their surrogate, they discover a zygote. Meanwhile, Russell and Timmy go on double dates again.
episodes.title: Zygote

episodes.synopsis: When Jeff decides to surprise Audrey by remembering their anniversary, he's the one who ends up being surprised.
episodes.title: Anniversary Chicken

episodes.synopsis: After Liz complains to Audrey about her love life, Audrey convinces Jeff to set her up with his recently divorced co-worker Todd.
episodes.title: The Set Up

episodes.synopsis: Jen starts to plan her and Adam's wedding and finds Adam's suggestions unhelpful.
episodes.title: Beating the System

episodes.synopsis: When an old photo of Jeff appears in an art gallery, he decides it's time to make some changes in his life.
episodes.title: The Jeff Photo

episodes.synopsis: Jeff and Audrey panic when they are told they might be having twins. Meanwhile, Russell throws a citizenship party for Timmy to impress a girl.
episodes.title: Double Down

episodes.synopsis: Jeff is threatened when Audrey gets a raise and makes almost as much as he does.
episodes.title: The Power Couple

episodes.synopsis: Russell books a cruise that he thinks is filled with "red hot" ladies but instead it's filled with ladies from the Red Hat society.
episodes.title: The Last of the Red Hat Lovers

episodes.synopsis: Russell returns from his cruise, where he ran into his former fling Liz. After a drunken night together, they got married -- but now he wants out.
episodes.title: Dirty Talk

episodes.synopsis: Worried about getting his father's approval, Russell gets Liz all dolled up to meet him.
episodes.title: Bros Before Nodes

episodes.synopsis: After having a node surgically removed, Audrey is temporarily unable to speak -- and Jeff is elated. Meanwhile, Russell forces Timmy to fire someone.
episodes.title: Audrey Is Dumb

episodes.synopsis: The gang and Liz go on a weekend trip to see the autumn leaves up north, where Russell does some soul searching about his marriage.
episodes.title: Nature Calls

episodes.synopsis: Jeff finds a phone app that sends his calls directly to Audrey's voice mail. Meanwhile, Liz continues to pursue Timmy after their misunderstood kiss.
episodes.title: Shy Dial

episodes.synopsis: Audrey encourages Jeff to eat healthier when he's diagnosed with high cholesterol, but he continues sneaking unhealthy snacks with Brenda.
episodes.title: Cheating

episodes.synopsis: When Audrey buys a new chair that Jeff hates, she refuses to admit that she hates it, too. Later, Adam builds a fort from the crate the chair came in.
episodes.title: The Chair

episodes.synopsis: To apologize for not participating in Liz's game night, Jeff sends Audrey on a romantic scavenger hunt. But, a misinterpretation of clues angers her.
episodes.title: Scavenger Hunt

episodes.synopsis: Audrey raises money from the neighbors to help pay for an operation to correct her housekeeper's limp but later finds there's been a misunderstanding.
episodes.title: A Big Bust

episodes.synopsis: Jeff confronts Audrey after realizing that she asks him for favors after sex, getting him to do things he wouldn't normally agree to.
episodes.title: After the Lovin'

episodes.synopsis: Using an Internet site for finding missed connections, Timmy is determined to reconnect with a woman he shared a romantic moment with on the subway.
episodes.title: Missed Connections

episodes.synopsis: When Audrey asks Jeff to name five things he likes about her, he struggles to come up with a reply. Later, Russell sets Timmy up to embarrass himself.
episodes.title: The Five Things

episodes.synopsis: When Audrey takes Jen to a Bon Jovi concert, Jeff decides to barbecue on the roof  --  and he doesn't invite Adam.
episodes.title: Meat Wars

episodes.synopsis: Audrey inadvertently breaks a young girl's doll repeatedly. Meanwhile, with Brenda carrying Jeff's child, he has concerns about her dating.
episodes.title: Goodbye Dolly

episodes.synopsis: Jen offers to throw a baby shower for Audrey but puts the wrong date on the invitations. Meanwhile, Russell takes a break from chasing women.
episodes.title: Audrey's Shower

episodes.synopsis: At first reluctant about letting Liz move in, Jeff notices the perks of having a third party observe Audrey's "unfair" demands.
episodes.title: Liz Moves In

episodes.synopsis: Jeff and Audrey realize that the names on their baby list are also the names of women whom Russell has slept with. Adam becomes a cycling enthusiast.
episodes.title: Taking Names

episodes.synopsis: Feeling lonely after her cat dies, Liz looks for a sperm donor. Adam rips the vintage wedding dress that Jennifer's family sends her.
episodes.title: Cats & Dogs

episodes.synopsis: Adam and Jennifer leave pot-laced cupcakes on the kitchen counter, and an unaware Jeff eats one.
episodes.title: Cupcake

episodes.synopsis: Expecting a rowdy reunion, Jeff is disappointed when his old college friends talk about their kids and go to bed early.
episodes.title: Fountain Of Youth

episodes.synopsis: Jeff feels that Audrey is trying to win her unborn child's affection by talking to Brenda's pregnant belly.
episodes.title: Baby Talk

episodes.synopsis: After forgetting to call ahead at a fancy restaurant, Jeff hopes that dressing Audrey as a well-known celebrity will get them a reservation.
episodes.title: Role Play

episodes.synopsis: While helping their friend cater a social event, Audrey tries to fit in with the women, but Jeff ends up being the life of the party.
episodes.title: Catering

episodes.synopsis: The couples attempt to enjoy recreational cooking classes together, but Jeff and Adam can't keep their competitive nature out of the kitchen.
episodes.title: Cooking Class

episodes.synopsis: When Jennifer learns that the guys have nothing planned for Adam's last weekend as a bachelor, she plans a party weekend.
episodes.title: Unpleasant Surprises

episodes.synopsis: Adam gets dramatic about choosing between Jeff and Russell as his best man but they could not care less. Russell disrespects Timmy one too many times.
episodes.title: Timmy Quits

episodes.synopsis: When Jeff learns that pregnant Brenda can't laugh without peeing her pants, he pulls out all his best jokes.
episodes.title: A Wee Problem

episodes.synopsis: Jeff and Audrey await the arrival of their baby as Brenda goes into labor.  Adam and Jennifer must reschedule their wedding to be there for the birth.
episodes.title: 100th
